subject: Re: [PATCH 2/9] mm/memory_hotplug: add __add_memory_driver_managed() with online_type arg

reviews.author: Gregory Price (author)
reviews.summary: Reviewer Gregory Price raised concerns about the use of a pointer to online_type in __add_memory_driver_managed() function, suggesting that it might be better to use a uint8_t directly as done in other parts of mm/memory_hotplug.c.

reviews.author: Cheatham, Benjamin
reviews.summary: Reviewer Cheatham pointed out implementation issues in the patch, specifically that devm_cxl_add_sysram_region() is never called outside of sysram_region_driver::probe(), and questioned the binding process between region drivers.

reviews.author: Jonathan Cameron
reviews.summary: Reviewer Jonathan Cameron raised concerns about the __add_memory_driver_managed() function, specifically whether it's sufficient to only check for enum assignment and not out-of-range integer values.

reviews.author: David (arm)
reviews.summary: Reviewer David raised concerns about code cleanliness and suggested casting online_type to its proper type in one specific instance.
